meanings.sent1: My aunt always brings me candy when she visits.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my aunt during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: My aunt is like a second mom to me, always looking out for me.
meanings.sent4: The bond between siblings is strong, just like the bond between a child and their aunt.
meanings.sent5: Whenever I need advice, I turn to my aunt for guidance.

meanings.definition: A woman who is a close friend or mentor.
meanings.sent1: My aunt from work helped me prepare for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: I consider my neighbor to be like an aunt to me, always there to support me.
meanings.sent3: My aunt at the gym motivates me to keep pushing myself during workouts.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, having a mentor like an aunt can make a big difference.
meanings.sent5: Having an aunt figure in your life can provide valuable guidance and support.
